name: chattr-workspace
description: Workspace scripts for Chattr chat application

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd nuxt-app && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../nuxt-app && npm install
scripts.clean: cd server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../nuxt-app && rm -rf node_modules .nuxt
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo 'âœ… Dependencies installed! Now set up Supabase using SUPABASE_SETUP.md'
